statements: DELETE FROM monitoring_systems WHERE system_name = 'Database Server' AND cpu_utilization > 80;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE resolved = FALSE;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 101 AND resolved = FALSE;
DELETE FROM system_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Database' AND utilization < 0.5;
DELETE FROM resource_tracking WHERE resource_type = 'server' AND resource_value > 80;
DELETE FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM resources WHERE resource_name = 'Disk Storage';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE severity = 'High' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
